dcterms:creator: Martin B. Haugh
Raghav Singal
dcterms:description: The Dishonest Casino HMM is a hidden Markov model used to illustrate the concepts of states, observations, transitions, and emissions in educational settings. It involves a sequence of die rolls where the casino switches between a fair die and a loaded die, allowing for the exploration of counterfactual questions regarding the casino's winnings attributable to cheating.
dcterms:title: Dishonest Casino HMM

dcterms:creator: Martin B. Haugh
Raghav Singal
dcterms:description: The Penn Action Dataset is a large dataset containing video clips of various human actions, annotated with joint locations for human pose estimation tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: Martin B. Haugh
Raghav Singal
dcterms:description: The Sub-JHMDB Dataset is a subset of the JHMDB dataset, which contains video clips of human actions with annotations for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Sub-JHMDB Dataset
